report.name: conconsr

dataSource.name: Q_cont_rec
dataSource.select: SELECT f.filsigle, c.soccont, c.numcont, decode(c.top30,'N',substr(c.cav,2,2),'O',decode(c.cav,'000',null,c.cav)) cav, s.soclib, c.cagrement , c.niche, c.crang, c.cnaffair, to_char(c.cdatarr,'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatarr, c.cobjet1, c.cobjet2, c.cobjet3, substr(c.crem,1,50) as remA, substr(c.crem,50,50) as remB, c.codsg, si.libdsg, c.comcode, c.ctypfact, to_char(c.ccoutht,'FM99G999G990D00') "Cout evalue", to_char(c.ccharesti,'FM9G999G990D00') "Charge estimee", to_char(c.cdatdeb, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatdeb, to_char(c.cdatfin, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatfin, lc.ident, SUBSTR(r.rnom,0,23) as rnom, SUBSTR(r.rprenom,0,14) as rprenom, pack_situation_p.verif_situ_ligcont_rep(lc.ident,lc.soccont,lc.lresdeb,lc.lresfin) as lcprest, to_char(PACK_CONTRAT.GET_COUT_SITU_COMP ( lc.ident,lc.soccont,lc.lresdeb,lc.lresfin ),'FM99G999G990D00') Coutjour, to_char(c.cdatsai, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatsai, to_char(c.cdatdir, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatRetPole, to_char(c.cdatdeb, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatdeb, to_char(c.cdatfin, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatfin, to_char(c.cdatrpol, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as cdatEnvoiPole, cf.libcfrais, c.siren, md.CODE_CONTRACTUEL, lc.lcnum, lc.lresdeb, lc.lresfin FROM ligne_cont lc, contrat c, ressource r, societe s, struct_info si, filiale_cli f, centre_frais cf,mode_contractuel md WHERE c.codsg = si.codsg AND c.soccont = lc.soccont (+) AND c.numcont = lc.numcont (+) AND c.cav = lc.cav (+) AND lc.ident = r.ident (+) AND c.soccont = s.soccode AND f.filcode = c.filcode AND c.ccentrefrais=cf.codcfrais AND lc.MODE_CONTRACTUEL = md.CODE_CONTRACTUEL(+) &P_WHERE ORDER BY lc.lcnum

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( c.top30 , 'N' , substr ( c.cav , 2 , 2 ) , 'O' , decode ( c.cav , '000' , null , c.cav ) )
to_char ( PACK_CONTRAT.GET_COUT_SITU_COMP ( lc.ident , lc.soccont , lc.lresdeb , lc.lresfin ) , 'FM99G999G990D00' )

textSegment.string: N° Début Fin MC Ident Nom Prénom Prest Coût un.HT

function.name: afterpform
m_1_grpfrformattrigger
r_1formattrigger
b_pageformattrigger
f_pageformattrigger
b_soclib2formattrigger
b_cav1formattrigger
m_1_cadreformattrigger
